Title: Lack of Input Validation
Content:
The [`constructor`](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/blob/5e1222e8c31731cf230c2e3b709683b10a5c1b0e/contracts/MOROFT.sol#L11-L19) of the `MOROFT` contract does not verify if the values for the `_delegate` and `_minter` input addresses are non-zero. While [the `_delegate` address is validated for zero address in the `OAppCore` contract](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/blob/5e1222e8c31731cf230c2e3b709683b10a5c1b0e/contracts/%40layerzerolabs/lz-evm-oapp-v2/contracts/oapp/OAppCore.sol#L29), the `_minter` addresses are never validated.


To prevent initializing these addresses to zero, consider adding proper checks.


***Update:** Resolved in [pull request #28](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/pull/28) at commit [8242004](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/pull/28/commits/8242004d59a86a3f55446b7985a4ffdafe33a922).*
